text: Hagi Juda vahe'ma osi'ama mani'naza naga'ma, Isipi mopafi vanunema hu'za hanavemati'za e'naza vahera zamazeri tregahue. Ana hanuge'za mago'a bainati kazinteti zamahe nefrisage'za, mago'a ne'zanku hu'za frigahaze. Hagi zamagine vaheteti vuno zamagima omane vahete'ma vanige'za ana maka vahera bainati kazinteti zamahe nefrisage'za mago'a ne'zanku hu'za frigahaze. Ana hu'za ana maka Isipi mopafi fri hana hanage'za, vahe'mo'zama nezamage'za zamanogu nehu'za, kiza zokago ke hunezamante'za, vahe'ma sifnama huzmante'nakura Juda vahe'mo'zama hu'nazaza huta haviza hiho hu'za hugahaze.
